footer.description: A fun and innovative educational platform offering STEAM & AI digital labs, interactive models, coding workshops, and prototypes to reinvent learning, stimulate creativity, and prepare for success in the world of tomorrow.

card_1.title: Discover the magical world of AI
card_1.content: AI-Kids Lab is an innovative educational space dedicated to introducing children to artificial intelligence, future technologies, and algorithmic thinking.

card_2.title: Beyond tech, grow your Digital Literacy
card_2.content: Warshati Digital Lab is an interactive space where children explore digital tools, adopt best practices, and become responsible, informed digital citizens.

card_3.title: Imagine, create, and play with STEAM
card_3.content: Warshati STEAM Lab is an interactive learning space designed to stimulate creativity, critical thinking, and innovation through hands-on workshops and experimental projects.

pedarogy.title: Creativity & Innovation
pedarogy.description: Unleash your imagination! Create unique inventions, explore new ideas, and become a budding innovator.

pedarogy.title: Critical Thinking
pedarogy.description: Awaken your thinking! Analyze ideas, ask questions, and develop logical thinking to better understand the world around you.

pedarogy.title: Problem Solving
pedarogy.description: Face challenges! Find innovative solutions and learn how to overcome obstacles with creativity and strategy.

pedarogy.title: Adaptability & Autonomy
pedarogy.description: Be flexible and independent! Adapt to new situations and take control of your learning with confidence.

pedarogy.title: Collaboration & Communication
pedarogy.description: Learn with friends and share ideas! At Warshati, teamwork is key to achieving great things.

pedarogy.title: Scientific Mindset & Curiosity
pedarogy.description: Explore, test, and discover! Ask questions, experiment, and build an insatiable curiosity for the world around you.

pedarogy.title: Ethical Awareness
pedarogy.description: Use technology responsibly! Learn ethical values, online safety, and become a responsible digital citizen.

pedarogy.title: Entrepreneurial Spirit
pedarogy.description: Turn your ideas into action! Learn innovation, initiative, and develop an entrepreneurial mindset from a young age.

pedarogy.title: Digital Culture
pedarogy.description: Master the digital world! Understand technologies, protect your data, and use digital tools responsibly and creatively.

list.title: Discovery
list.description: Exploration of equipment and technological concepts

list.title: Initiation
list.description: Introduction to basic principles and fundamental practices

list.title: Development
list.description: Deepening of skills and advanced techniques

list.title: Mastery
list.description: Refinement and innovation in complex contexts

curricula.title: Smart Workshops Program

items.title: STEAM
items.description: A well-structured STEAM education program offers students hands-on, interdisciplinary learning experiences by meaningfully integrating science, technology, engineering, arts, and mathematics.

items.title: AI & ML
items.description: A structured program introduces students to Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) through age-appropriate, practical activities, encouraging problem-solving, creativity, and computational thinking.

items.title: Computational Thinking
items.description: A curriculum focused on software development and data science helps students strengthen their logical reasoning and algorithmic thinking skills, while nurturing creative and efficient problem analysis.

items.title: Coding (Text & Block)
items.description: A progressive coding program that combines visual block-based programming with traditional text-based languages. Students begin with block coding and gradually move toward writing actual code.

items.title: Information & Data
items.description: Learn to search for accurate information online, choose trustworthy sources, and organize digital content smartly. Discover how to safely find, store, and manage data.

items.title: Creating Digital Content
items.description: Learn how to design and edit digital content! Explore how to build on existing knowledge while respecting copyrights and licenses, and how to give clear instructions to computers.

items.title: Online Safety
items.description: Learn how to protect your devices, personal data, and privacy in the digital world. Discover how to safeguard your well-being while using technology, and understand how digital tools can promote inclusion and sustainability.

items.title: Connected & Collaborative
items.description: Engage, connect, and collaborate using digital tools while embracing cultural and generational diversity. Learn to manage your online identity and build a strong, positive digital presence.

curricula.text: The program spans a full academic year, structured around quarterly milestones.
curricula.subtext: The program spans a full academic year, structured around quarterly milestones.

thematique.title: Smart Workshops Project
thematique.text: A series of 10 to 20 Smart Workshops, focused on building a concrete project inspired by a specific theme.

items.title: Smart Car
items.description: A self-driving car that talks to you and helps avoid accidents for safer travel!

items.title: Smart City
items.description: Children explore technology trends and their impact on cities. They program their first self-driving car and control traffic lights.

items.title: Smart Home
items.description: Children discover next-gen technologies installed in homes to make them smarter and safer.

items.title: Smart Factory
items.description: Children explore various uses of robotics in industry like automatic assembly lines, scanners, robotic arms, forklifts, and more.

items.title: Smart Agriculture
items.description: Learn to use tools that help plants grow better.

items.title: Connected Forests
items.description: Use sensors to monitor trees and protect forests.

items.title: Connected Health
items.description: Discover how technology can help treat patients and improve healthcare.

items.title: Digital Art
items.description: Create drawings and objects using computers and 3D printers.

items.title: Space and Astronomy
items.description: Explore stars and planets by building models and robots.

items.title: Smart Drones
items.description: Learn how drones fly to capture photos, deliver packages, or monitor areas, all remotely controlled.

items.title: Renewable Energy
items.description: Build models powered by sunlight, wind, or water.

items.title: Climate and Weather
items.description: Understand the weather and build tools to measure rain, wind, and sunshine.

items.title: Fun Robots
items.description: Build small robots that move, talk, or follow lines.

items.title: Educational Games
items.description: Create interactive games that make learning fun.

items.title: Oceans and Protection
items.description: Discover the secrets of the oceans and how to protect them using simple tools.

items.title: Artificial Limbs
items.description: Discover how technology helps build moving arms, legs, and other parts to assist people, like robotic limbs.

items.title: Continuous Training
items.description: Innovative training programs to stay at the forefront of digital pedagogy and develop new skills.

items.title: Interactive Workshops
items.description: Hands-on and collaborative sessions to experiment with modern teaching approaches adapted to current technologies.

items.title: Coaching and Mentoring
items.description: Personalized support from experts to enhance and enrich your classroom practices.

items.title: Educational Resources and Tools
items.description: Access to a comprehensive library of digital tools, guides, and materials to optimize your teaching.

items.title: Support
items.description: Warshati supports schools and teachers in the seamless integration of its educational tools through training, personalized follow-up, and continuous support.

items.title: Complementarity
items.description: Warshati integrates harmoniously with school curricula, enriching learning with interactive and innovative approaches aligned with educational objectives.

items.title: Innovative Equipment
items.description: State-of-the-art equipment allowing users to become familiar with the tools of the future.

items.title: What is Warshati?
items.content: Warshati is an intelligent Moroccan educational platform dedicated to learning STEMA programs (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics) and Intellectual Intelligence. It offers an immersive and interactive approach, aiming to prepare students for the challenges of the 21st century by integrating essential skills such as critical thinking, collaboration, creativity, and problem-solving.

items.title: Why choose Warshati?
items.content: Warshati stands out for its innovative approach and its ability to personalize learning. Through a methodology based on project-based learning and active reflection, it promotes the development of students’ cognitive and socio-emotional skills. In addition, Warshati offers an interactive and accessible platform, tailored to the needs of both the Moroccan and international educational systems.

items.title: How does Warshati work?
items.content: Warshati is structured into programs and learning paths that combine interest with practical application. Students work on real-world projects in thematic labs (STEMA, M, IoT, etc.) and use digital tools to develop both technical and soft skills. The teaching follows the 'I do, we do, you do' method, encouraging collaborative learning and autonomy.

items.title: Who delivers Warshati?
items.content: Warshati is delivered by a team of trainers specialized in pedagogy and educational systems, supported by academic and industry professionals to ensure the quality and relevance of the offered programs.

items.title: Who is Warshati for?
items.content: Warshati is designed for all students from primary to secondary school, as well as teachers looking to improve their expertise in science, technology, engineering, arts, and mathematics. It is also intended for educational institutions that aim to integrate 21st-century skills into their curricula.

items.title: Where is Warshati held?
items.content: Warshati is offered both online and in physical workshops called 'Smart Workshops'. These workshops are available in various regions of Morocco and are also accessible remotely via the digital platform.

items.title: When can I order Warshati?
items.content: You can order Warshati at any time through our online platform. Programs are available year-round, and you can begin as soon as you’re ready to register.

items.title: What age group is Warshati for?
items.content: Warshati is intended for children and young adults, primarily ages 6 to 18, but also offers training for teachers and professionals seeking to improve their knowledge in STEMA and AI fields.

items.title: What are the prerequisites and levels?
items.content: The Warshati program is open to all students interested in STEMA and AI, whether beginners or advanced. It is also designed for educators aiming to integrate these disciplines into their teaching practices.

items.title: Where are the Smart Workshops held?
items.content: Warshati’s Smart Workshops are organized in various training centers, schools, etc., as well as online for flexible access. Each workshop is designed to offer a hands-on, interactive experience tailored to participants’ needs.

hero.title: Research and Innovation at the Heart of Warshati
hero.description: At Warshati, Research and Innovation drive our educational solutions. We explore emerging technologies to prepare students for future challenges. Have an idea or want to contribute to our research? Contact our R&I team and help shape the future of education.

layout.title: Welcome to the blog!
layout.text:
At Warshati, we believe that education is a key lever for preparing future generations for the challenges of the 21st century. Our smart Moroccan platform offers innovative solutions by integrating STEAM and Artificial Intelligence programs to deliver an immersive and interactive learning experience.

Through this blog, we share news, educational resources, and insights on education and technology. Discover how our labs (STEAM LAB, AI LAB, IoT LAB, etc.), assessment tools, and personalized teaching methods transform learning into an exciting adventure.

Stay connected to explore inspiring projects, user testimonials, and reflections on the evolution of educational systems. Together, let’s shape a future where creativity, collaboration, and innovation are at the heart of learning!

rest.text: Since I started using Smart Workshops, my students show real enthusiasm for science and technology!

article_1.title: How Smart Workshops Are Transforming Student Learning

content.intro: Traditional educational methods are evolving, and Smart Workshops are revolutionizing how students learn. But what makes these workshops so special?
content.theoryAndPractice: Smart Workshops combine theory and practice through digital tools and interactive approaches. For example, by working on STEAM projects, students not only develop technical skills but also collaboration and creativity.
content.head: Key Benefits
head_content: Better understanding of complex concepts through active learning.
Development of essential 21st-century skills such as problem-solving and critical thinking.

article_2.title: Top 5 STEAM Projects to Do with Your Students

content.intro: Want to inspire your students? Here are 5 STEAM projects to implement in your classroom for fun and educational learning.
content.head: Projects

projects.name: Build a Robotic Arm with Arduino
projects.description: Introduce students to programming and electronics.

projects.name: Smart City Model
projects.description: Explore IoT and renewable energy concepts.

projects.name: Digital Art with Python
projects.description: Combine technology and creativity to produce unique artworks.

projects.name: Analyze Local Weather Data
projects.description: Teach data collection and analysis using modern tools.

article_3.title: Artificial Intelligence in Moroccan Classrooms: Opportunities and Challenges

content.intro: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is becoming a powerful tool in Moroccan schools. But how can it be effectively integrated, and what are the obstacles?
content.head: Opportunities
head_content: Creating personalized learning paths through data analysis.
Automating repetitive tasks for teachers.
Interactive tools like educational chatbots to answer student questions.
head_1_content: Need to train teachers in emerging technologies.
Ensure equal access to technology in rural areas.

article_4.title: Coding for Kids: Where to Start and Why It’s Crucial

content.intro: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is becoming a powerful tool in Moroccan schools. But how can it be effectively integrated, and what are the obstacles?
content.head: Why It’s Important
head_content: Coding enhances logical thinking and creativity.
Digital skills are essential in nearly all careers.
head_1_content: Online platforms like Scratch or Code.org.
Hands-on workshops, such as those offered by Warshati, for full immersion.
head_2_content: Start with simple projects, like game creation, to keep kids engaged.

article_5.title: The Impact of Interactive Models on Young Learners' Scientific Understanding

content.intro: Interactive models aren’t just fun—they help students better grasp scientific concepts by making them tangible.
content.head: Examples
head_content: A solar system model where students move the planets to understand orbits.
A hydraulic model to explain fluid mechanics principles.
head_1_content: According to a recent study, students using interactive models retain 40% more information compared to traditional lessons.

content.intro: In a constantly evolving world, 21st-century skills like creativity, collaboration, and critical thinking are essential. How do STEAM programs foster their development?
content.head: Examples
head_content: Collaboration through group projects.
Problem-solving via hands-on challenges.
Communication through presenting results.
content.head_2_content: In a STEAM workshop, students built a water filtration system combining chemistry, engineering, and biology.

content.intro: The Internet of Things (IoT) is transforming industries—but did you know it can also revolutionize classrooms?
content.head: Educational Applications of IoT
head_content: Real-time monitoring of scientific experiments.
Building smart home models with connected sensors.
Analyzing local environmental data.

article_8.title: Gamification in Education: A Powerful Tool for Engagement

content.intro: Gamification turns learning into an immersive and motivating adventure. But how does it actually work?
content.head: Examples
head_content: Using point and reward systems.
Creating challenges tailored to each student's level.
content.head_2_content: Students involved show a 30% increase in engagement.
content.head_3_content: An interactive math quiz lets students progress in a game while reinforcing their knowledge.

article_9.title: STEAM for Inclusion: Making Technology Accessible to All

content.intro: STEAM programs are not just for the elite—they are a powerful tool to promote inclusion.
content.head: Inclusive Initiatives
head_content: Workshops tailored for students with special needs.
Use of accessible tools like tablets with voice controls.
content.head_2_content: Encouraging diversity in scientific and technical careers.

content.intro: Engineering is often seen as abstract. Models help make these concepts concrete and understandable.
content.head: Activity Examples
head_content: Building bridges with recycled materials to understand forces and structures.
Creating miniature irrigation systems to teach hydraulic principles.
head_1_content: Better visualization of complex technical concepts.

content.intro: AI is often associated with analytical tasks, but it can also be a powerful tool to unleash students’ creativity.
content.head: AI-Generated Creative Works
head_content: AI-assisted generation of art.
Creation of interactive stories using language models.
content.head_2_content: AI offers a fresh perspective and inspires unique ideas.

article_12.title: Building a STEAM Culture in Moroccan Schools

content.intro: To prepare students for a tech-driven future, Moroccan schools must build a strong STEAM culture.
content.head: Key Steps
head_content: Train teachers in new teaching methods.
Incorporate hands-on projects from an early age.
Collaborate with platforms like Warshati to access innovative tools.
content.head_2_content: Motivated, curious students ready to face future challenges.

testimonials.heading: Our Testimonials
testimonials.description: We offer placeholder text here to describe testimonials. It can be replaced with real content later.
cards: Thanks to my school's AI Lab, I created an app that detects emotions in images. This inspired me to pursue a career in data science.
Thanks to them, our school took a new digital turn.
An immersive experience for both students and teachers.

commencer.greeting_1: Let’s build a learning path just for you
commencer.last: Your Personalized Learning path is ready.

commencerCards.cardText: Warshati keeps you engaged with interactive lessons, fun challenges, and daily inspiration—designed just for you.
With Warshati’s fun and well-structured courses, I’ve mastered concepts that once felt challenging. Now, I feel confident tackling real-world problems and technical challenges with ease!

firstCard.cardText: Young minds use Warshati to sharpen their problem-solving skills and grow their knowledge.

choices.leftText: Let’s create a personalized learning journey just for you!

nextCard.cardText: Warshati's tailored, interactive lessons with hands-on practice accelerate learning 6x faster than videos.
Warshati's tailored, interactive lessons with hands-on practice accelerate learning 6x faster than videos.
Warshati's tailored, interactive lessons with hands-on practice accelerate learning 6x faster than videos.

answers.reply: Get Ready to embrace the future
The key to a life full of excitement. Wise choice!
Your future self will thank you.
Igniting young minds is always rewarding.

commencerDataSets.question: What would you like to explore today?

answers.reply: Get ready to tackle challenges like a pro!
A strong foundation makes everything easier.

commencerDataSets.question: When do you want to learn?

answers.text: In the morning, during breakfast or on my way to school
answers.reply: Your brain loves a good start. Smart move!

answers.text: During a quick break, like lunch or between activities
At night, after dinner or while getting ready for bed
answers.reply: Exploring science under the stars? Sounds magical!

answers.text: At another time that works for me
answers.reply: Anytime is a great time to learn.

common.pls_wait: Please wait while training is in progress...

finger-section.title: Finger Labeling
finger-section.dict_desc: Customize your learning: Label your fingers your way!
finger-section.project_description: In this project, we will be labeling the fingers of the hand using prebuilt models provided by Google to detect hand landmarks. We will use your dictionary in the second phase of training to label fingers as you need. Press Train to start training.

accordion.title: Train Split
accordion.description: The train split is the percentage of the data that is used for training. The remaining data is used for validation. It is usually 80%.

accordion.title: Epochs
accordion.description: An epoch is one complete pass through the training data. The number of epochs is the number of times the model will see the training data.

accordion.title: Batch Size
accordion.description: The batch size is the number of training examples in one forward/backward pass. The higher  the batch size, the more memory is required.

accordion.title: Learning Rate
accordion.description: The learning rate is a hyperparameter that controls how much the model is adjusted during training. A higher learning rate means the model will learn faster, but it may not converge.

ai_chatbot.title: AI Chatbot
ai_chatbot.project_description: In this project, we will make an AI chatbot using OpenAI's API. The user will follow three simple steps: first, they will enter their name, an API key, and a welcome message; next, they will turn chatbot features on or off; and finally, they will start and test the chatbot in an easy-to-use interface.

revise_modal.expected_placeholder: Enter what you expected the bot to respond with...

finger_labeling.title: Finger Labeling
finger_labeling.description: Train a computer to recognize your own finger and label them.

image_classification.title: Image Classifier
image_classification.description: Train a computer to classify your own images into categories.

object_detection.title: Object Detection
object_detection.description: Train a computer to recognize your own objects.

shape_classification.title: Shape Classifier
shape_classification.description: Train a computer to classify your own shapes into 4 categories.

ai_chatbot.title: AI Chatbot
ai_chatbot.description: Train a computer to chat with you.

upload_image_card.drag: or drag and drop here to upload

train_form.train_start_message: Training started: It may take a few seconds to a few minutes depending on the size of the data. Please wait.

new.title: Append Data to model
new.description: Append data to model to improve the accuracy of the model.You must append data with the same classes names as the model.

existing.title: Train New Model
existing.description: Train new model with same data or new data.your current model will be replaced with the new model. make sure to export your model before training new model.

chatbot-section.disc: Configure your chatbot's features and train it to respond to user queries. Select the features you want to enable and click the Train button to start the training process.
chatbot-section.secDisc: Source files detected! Your chatbot will be trained with the uploaded documents.
chatbot-section.pls_wait: Please wait while your chatbot is being trained...
chatbot-section.processing: Processing source documents for enhanced responses
chatbot-section.thirdSec: Upload documents like PDFs, text files, or other sources that your chatbot will use to answer questions. These files will be processed and used as knowledge sources for your chatbot.
chatbot-section.sure: Are you sure you want to delete the file
chatbot-section.permamentDelete: This will permanently delete the file from the server.
chatbot-section.ensure: Please ensure your files meet the requirements:
